articles.author: Brian McTaggart
articles.title: Astros closer Ryan Pressly embodies Texas in ALCS - MLB.com
articles.description: HOUSTON -- There is no player competing in the 2023 American League Championship Series who embodies the Lone Star State more than Astros closer Ryan Pressly, who was born in Dallas, has a tattoo of the state on his back and is seldom seen not wearing cowboy …
